markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Rogue Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=727) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
<trait label="Multiclass" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=115" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 229 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Rogue](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=10)

**Prerequisites**
Dexterity 14

</column>

---

You gain a skill feat and the rogue’s surprise attack class feature. You become trained in light armor. In addition, you become trained in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) or [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) plus one skill of your choice; if you are already trained in both Stealth and Thievery, you become trained in an additional skill of your choice. You become trained in rogue class DC.

**Special** You cannot gain another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the rogue archetype.

<title level="2">Rogue Dedication leads to...</title>
[Basic Trickery](/Feats.aspx?ID=728), [Evasiveness (Rogue)](/Feats.aspx?ID=733), [Skill Mastery (Rogue)](/Feats.aspx?ID=731), [Sneak Attacker](/Feats.aspx?ID=729), [Uncanny Dodge](/Feats.aspx?ID=732)
name: Rogue Dedication

</summary>
